mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attainment (attainment_no,user_id, attainment_name, attainment_type, attainment_duration, attainment_target, attainment_finish, attainment_rate, star, start_date, end_date) VALUES (attainment_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{attainment_name}, #{attainment_type}, #{attainment_duration}, #{attainment_target}, #{attainment_finish}, #{attainment_rate}, #{star}, #{start_date}, #{end_date})

INSERT INTO attainment (attainment_no,user_id, attainment_name, attainment_type, attainment_duration, attainment_target, attainment_finish, attainment_rate, star, start_date, end_date,group_id) VALUES (attainment_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{attainment_name}, #{attainment_type}, #{attainment_duration}, #{attainment_target}, #{attainment_finish}, #{attainment_rate}, #{star}, #{start_date}, #{end_date},#{group_id})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM attainment WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND attainment_duration = 'short_term' AND TRUNC(start_date) = TRUNC(#{select_date}) AND group_id IS NULL

SELECT * FROM attainment WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND attainment_duration = 'long_term' AND TRUNC(start_date) <= TRUNC(#{select_date}) AND TRUNC(end_date) >=TRUNC(#{select_date}) AND group_id IS NULL
SELECT * FROM attainment WHERE group_id = #{group_id} AND attainment_duration = 'short_term' AND TRUNC(start_date) = TRUNC(#{select_date})
SELECT * FROM attainment WHERE group_id = #{group_id} AND attainment_duration = 'long_term' AND TRUNC(start_date) <= TRUNC(#{select_date}) AND TRUNC(end_date) >=TRUNC(#{select_date})
